timeline.bodyText:
This version should be set. The best is to use attributes for this. With Antora it's a bit messy:

in documentation/src/main/antora/antora.yaml add a line for the JBoss logging version:

jboss-logging-version: '${jboss-logging.version}'



in the documentation/pom.xml or in the root pom.xml declare the jboss-logging.version property


in the getting-started document, use {jboss-logging-version} (no $) and [source,xml,subs=attributes+]
timeline.author: cescoffier
